3P2N.F.summary: Trillion Energy International Inc., together with its subsidiaries, operates as an oil and gas exploration, and production company in Bulgaria and Turkey. It owns oil and gas producing assets in Turkey; and a coal bed methane exploration license in Bulgaria. The company was formerly known as Park Place Energy Inc. and changed its name to Trillion Energy International Inc. in April 2019. Trillion Energy International Inc. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.

IPEKE.IS.long_name: Ipek Dogal Enerji Kaynaklari Arastirma ve Üretim A.S.
IPEKE.IS.summary: Ipek Dogal Enerji Kaynaklari Arastirma ve Ãretim A.S. focuses on developing and producing renewable energy resources; and petroleum, natural gas, coal, and related natural energy resources in Turkey. It also engages in the construction and mining, air transportation, tourism and hotel management, and food and farming activities. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Ankara, Turkey.

MEPET.IS.long_name: Mepet Metro Petrol ve Tesisleri Sanayi Ticaret A.S.
MEPET.IS.summary: Mepet Metro Petrol ve Tesisleri Sanayi Ticaret A.S. owns and operates fuel stations and road rest facilities in Turkey. The company owns and operates 24 fuel stations that sell fuel and petroleum products. It also offers road recreational services to bus passengers, private vehicle passengers, and long-distance drivers; and other services in the tourism sector. The company was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

NTGAZ.IS.summary: Naturelgaz Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in the supply of natural gas through CNG and LNG pipelines. It also provides LNG system installation and LNG supply services. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Beyoglu, Turkey. Naturelgaz Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Global Yatirim Holding A.S.

TCF.CN.summary: Trillion Energy International Inc., together with its subsidiaries, operates as an oil and gas exploration, and production company in Bulgaria and Turkey. It owns oil and gas producing assets in Turkey; and a coal bed methane exploration license in Bulgaria. The company was formerly known as Park Place Energy Inc. and changed its name to Trillion Energy International Inc. in April 2019. Trillion Energy International Inc. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.

TUPRS.IS.summary: TÃ¼rkiye Petrol Rafinerileri A.S., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the refining crude oil, petroleum, and chemical products in Turkey and internationally. It is also involved in the purchase, sale, import, export, storage, and marketing of petroleum products, LPG, and natural gas. The company's products include liquid petroleum gases, fuel oils, base oils, waxes, extracts, and bitumen and bitumen binders, as well as white spirits, cutting oils, clarified oils, petroleum coke, and sulphur products. In addition, it engages in the transportation of crude oil and petroleum products; operation of factories and facilities in petrochemical and energy related industries; and air, maritime, road, and rail transportation activities, as well as provision of mooring and tug services. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in KÃ¶rfez, Turkey. TÃ¼rkiye Petrol Rafinerileri A.S. is a subsidiary of Enerji Yatirimlari A.S.
